issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-160
issue.discussion: The last sentence of 29.5.1 [atomics.types.integral]/1 says "Table 143 shows typedefs to atomic integral classes and the corresponding typedefs." That's nice, but nothing says these are supposed to be part of the implementation, and they are not listed in the synopsis.
issue.resolution: Remove Table 143 and the last sentence of 29.5.1 [atomics.types.integral]/1.
